prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon with a mischievous grin and a shiny gemstone.
Show me a dark-type creature that lurks in shadows and loves shiny objects.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in caves, with unique purple skin and glowing red eyes.
Generate a spooky, yet playful Pokemon that can manipulate darkness and light.
Give me a creature with a quirky personality, adorned with crystals and a playful stance.
Design a Pokemon that blends seamlessly into urban environments with dark colors and sharp features.
Make a Pokemon that embodies a trickster spirit, complete with a unique accessory.
